mapper.update: UPDATE playball_user_collect SET deleted = 0 WHERE uco_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM playball_user_collect WHERE uco_collected_id = #{ucoCollectedId} AND uco_u_id = #{ucoUId} AND uco_sort = #{ucoSort}

select.if: SELECT c.*,n.title AS title,n.image AS resources,n.page_view AS browse,page_view AS support,label AS `type`,n.* FROM playball_user_collect c INNER JOIN playball_news n ON c.uco_collected_id = n.id WHERE c.uco_u_id = #{vo.ucoUId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.*,c_title AS title,c_video AS resources,c_browse AS browse,c_comment AS support,2 AS `type` FROM playball_user_collect c INNER JOIN playball_curriculum cu ON c.uco_collected_id = cu.c_id WHERE c.uco_u_id = #{vo.ucoUId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.*,udy_content AS title,udy_resources AS resources,udy_support AS browse,udy_comment AS support,udy_res_type AS `type` FROM playball_user_collect c INNER JOIN playball_user_dynamic d ON c.uco_collected_id = d.udy_id WHERE c.uco_u_id = #{vo.ucoUId} ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
